meta.title: Alanis - Web Developer
meta.description: Full-stack developer specialized in creating robust, scalable and user-friendly web applications.

hero.title: Full-stack developer
hero.subtitle: Specialized in creating scalable, enterprise-grade applications with modern technologies.
hero.description: From payment processing to multi-tenant systems, I turn complex business requirements into elegant solutions.

features.title: Advantages
features.subtitle: Benefits
features.paragraph: Our web solutions are built with the latest full-stack technologies to achieve optimal performance, security, and SEO visibility. Each project is tailored for scalability, maintainability, and business growth.

enterpriseArchitecture.title: Enterprise-Grade Architecture
enterpriseArchitecture.description: All our platforms are built with clean, scalable, and secure architectures. We use modern frameworks like Next.js 15 and React 19, ensuring enterprise-level performance and reliability.

saasEcommerce.title: Custom SaaS & E‑Commerce Solutions
saasEcommerce.description: We specialize in building multi-tenant SaaS and e-commerce platforms with advanced features like automated billing, real-time inventory, and payment integrations using Stripe and Square.

highPerformance.title: High‑Performance & SEO Optimized
highPerformance.description: Our websites are crafted following Next.js best practices and SEO-optimized rendering strategies, ensuring top Core Web Vitals and enhanced Google visibility right out of the box.

realTime.title: Real‑Time Capabilities
realTime.description: From live order tracking to instant notifications, we implement real-time functionalities with technologies like Supabase, Upstash Redis, and WebSockets for instant data synchronization.

modernDevelopment.title: Modern Development Practices
modernDevelopment.description: We follow a full TDD approach using Jest and Playwright, CI/CD pipelines, and robust monitoring with Sentry and Vercel Analytics to guarantee production-ready deployments.

customizableScalable.title: Fully Customizable & Scalable
customizableScalable.description: Each solution is tailored to your exact business needs — easily expandable, ready for thousands of users, and fully customizable at every level of the stack.
